# Tender Announcement
## Welding Tools and Equipment
### General Information

* [Title] Welding Tools and Equipment [Contract Number] (W2037-240011)
* Solicitation Number: WS4245067703
* Publication Date: 2023-10-16
* Closing Date: 2023-10-31T14:00:00

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence, through the Royal Canadian Electrical and Mechanical Engineering School (RCEME School) in Borden, Ontario, is seeking bids for the supply and delivery of welding tools and equipment on an "as requested" basis.

### Key Requirements and Criteria

* The Standing Offer period is expected to be 2 years plus 1 year option period.
* Voluntary Set-Aside for Indigenous Business is included in the procurement.
* The end-user is the Department of National Defence.
* The contact person is Cheng, Sabrina (SPAC/PSPC) at sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Business and Technical Requirements

* The proposed solution must comply with the mandatory requirements outlined in the tender document.
* The contractor must be able to provide welding tools and equipment that meet the quality standards required for the RCEME School's instruction programs.

### How to Submit a Bid

* The tender notice is available on the Ariba platform at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17733154?extsite=MTc3MzMxNTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Prospective contractors must register with the Government of Canada's supplier registration database.

Note: The tender has been cancelled.
